properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 35 PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY
34-07.00N 018-47.00E AT 292055Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868, 2182 1444 6799,
E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
SALEM.ELKABIR@CAA.GOV.LY.
